message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is reflective of its worth and potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am unable to meet the price of $1,500,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your response.  I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value this product brings. How about we meet halfway and settle on a price of $1,350,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price of $1,350,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product.
